title: Spigot 1.15.2权限问题
author: tian1025426772
txt_content:
本帖最后由 tian1025426772 于 2020-4-9 01:49 编辑 

1：CMI如何显示TAB上的头像和称号？ess以前设置过，这个新插件完全找不到，有大佬帮帮忙么？                   2：如何设置登录插件登录一次就不用在输入密码了？用的AuthMe登录插件







9XC%9JBY8ETC``CWR_`6G4V.png
(29.28 KB, 下载次数: 0)




下载附件


2020-4-9 01:45 上传








如何叫TAB显示玩家称号

replies.author: happyvalley
replies.txt_content:
1不清楚，没买CMI
2的话AuthMe的config下有个
把enable值设置为true并且timeout后填上不用输密码的所谓“记住密码”时间就可以
settings:
    sessions:
        # Do you want to enable the session feature?
        # If enabled, when a player authenticates successfully,
        # his IP and his nickname is saved.
        # The next time the player joins the server, if his IP
        # is the same as last time and the timeout hasn't
        # expired, he will not need to authenticate.
        enabled: true
        # After how many minutes should a session expire?
        # A player's session ends after the timeout or if his IP has changed
        timeout: 10复制代码

replies.author: 安少An_Shao
replies.txt_content: 提示: 该帖被管理员或版主屏蔽

replies.author: tian1025426772
replies.txt_content:
安少An_Shao 发表于 2020-4-9 07:39
登录插件的话，如二楼所述
称号变量是
前缀%vault_prefix%
1：权限插件这边用的是:LuckPerms   
2：TAB菜单用的是：TitleManager
按照你的那样设置后不显示
